description:
@echounafraid posted this back in October last year and we just 💜 it! So we want to share with you!

I am here to declare how many chronic health issues are in my house and how many pharmaceutical products my family of five are dependent on. ⁣
⁣
Dear Health and Government Officials,⁣⁣
Why would you want that to change?⁣
If this is about health- shouldn’t you be asking what those of us who are NOT sick are doing differently rather than mandating us to change and become a part of the majority who are chronically ill? ⁣⁣
Come on now- is this really about public health...? #showmeyourhealth #normalizehealthy #whatsyournumber
